reviews.review_msg: I found Jade's class to be interesting and engaging. It was my favourite course for Spring 2016. I'm dissapointed that SFU did not hire her. I would love to take more courses with her. She is passionate about what she teaches and has lots of good real life advice about Qualitative research.

Jade is a nice lady and is an easy marker for the most part. taking lecture notes are pointless because gsws 204 is purely based on papers. even the in-class open book exam is based on academic articles. there is no exam/paper that requires you to know lecture notes. class is easy, but pretty boring. not much effort is required to get a good grade
